Package nl.weeaboo.vn.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAnimation
    Animated effect.
    IContext
    High-level container of state.
    IContextFactory<C extends IContext>
    Factory for IContext objects.
    IContextListener
    Event listener for IContext.
    IContextManager
    Manages the active IContext and context lifetimes.
    IDestructible
    Object which can destroy (dispose, close) itself.
    IEnvironment
    Wrapper object that contains global engine state.
    IEventListener
    General-purpose no-arg event listener.
    IInterpolator
    Remaps floating point values between 0.0) and 1.0 (both inclusive).
    IModule
    Sub-module of the engine.
    INotifier
    Shows notifications to the player.
    INovel
    Top-level class for controlling the game.
    IPrefsChangeListener
    Event listener for IPreferenceStore.
    IResourceCache
    Cached resources.
    IResourceResolver
    Finds the accompanying resource for a file path.
    ISkipState
    Skip, pause, auto read state.
    IStreamingMedia
    Shared interface for streaming media (audio, video).
    ISystemEnv
    Exposes properties of the system environment we're running in.
    ISystemModule
    Interface for interacting with hardware and external applications.
    IUpdateable
    Interface for objects that require a periodic tick function.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextListener
    Empty implementation of IContextListener.
    DistortGrid
    Represents a two-dimensional (width, height) grid of X/Y offsets.
    Duration
    An amount of time.
    Interpolators
    Defines various implementations of IInterpolator.
    NovelPrefs
    Defines global settings.
    ResourceId
    Unique identifier for a resolved resource (canonical path + type).
    ResourceLoadInfo
    Contains information about a callsite of a resource load operation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlendMode
    The blend mode determines how new pixels are combined with existing pixels during rendering.
    Direction
    General-purpose relative direction.
    MediaType
    Resource type.
    SkipMode
    Used when skipping.
    VerticalAlign
    Relative y-axis alignment.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InitException
    Represents a fatal error during startup or initialisation.
